title: "Shell in Greetings" is the wedding legend.
subtitle: The legend: The bridesmaid walks in the hallway at a wedding, grabs her hearing heels on the shaking floor, picks up evidence to get the shoes back, and falls the bride into an open hole.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The bridesmaid walks down the aisle at a wedding, grabs the heels of her hearing on the floor, picks the bullets to get the boots back, and falls in a hole open.
